news.text: Paper titled "Parallel Streaming between Heterogeneous HPC Resources for Real-time Analysis" was published in the %%Journal of Computational Science%%.

Proposal titled "Computer Science for the Common Good" was submitted to the %%Responsible CS Challenge%% with the hopes of revamping curriculum to integrate ethics, divserity, and inclusion into undergraduate computer science education.

Paper titled "Transferring Data from High-Performance Simulations to Extreme Scale Analysis Applications in Real-Time" was presented at %%CEBDA 2018%% (Convergence of Extreme Scale Computing and Big Data Analysis). CEBDA was a workshop held in conjunction with IPDPS (International Parallel & Distributed Processing Symposium).

Paper titled "A Path from Serial Execution to Hybrid Parallelization for Learning HPC" was presented at %%EduHPC%% (Workshop on Education for High-Performance Computing) held in conjunction with SC 2017.

Talk titled "Parallel Streaming for In Transit Analysis with Heterogeneous Data Layout" was presented at the %%ISAV workshop%% (In Situ Infrastructures for Enabling Extreme-scale Analysis and Visualization) held in conjunction with SC 2017.
